taxon.author: (O. Pickard-Cambridge, 1877)
taxon.distribution: India, Sri Lanka, Thailand, Japan, China to Indonesia (Sulawesi)

referenceObject.reference: Pickard-Cambridge, O. (1877c). On some new genera and species of Araneidea. Annals and Magazine of Natural History (4) 19(109): 26-39, pl. 6-7.
